specialAnnouncementMessage.en: HSBC recommends that you only install apps from official app stores. If you see pop ups, messages or emails containing links asking you to download an app, you should decline – it may be an attempt to install harmful software on your device.

resourcePrepareTitle.en: App Update downloading. Please do not close the app or turn off your device.

downloadOverTime.en: The update is taking longer than expected. Please check your network connection.

downloadDialogMessage.en: To continue using the HSBC Mobile Banking app, you must download an %size% MB update. We have detected that you are not connected to WiFi, so the download will take longer and use your mobile data plan. If you do not wish to download it now, please close this app until you are connected to WiFi.

downloadDialogMessageWithoutCancelOption.en: To continue using the HSBC Mobile Banking app, you must download an %size% MB update.
